metadata.Title: CVE-2014-2079 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
X File Explorer (aka xfe) might allow local users to bypass intended access restrictions and gain access to arbitrary files by leveraging failure to use directory masks when creating files on Samba and NFS shares.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-2079` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

xfe - 1.37-2
xfe-i18n - 1.37-2
xfe-themes - 1.37-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xfe package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.37-2').
